title: black screen bug
body:
i need help in this i cant fix it 
i tried everyway online but didnt work

replies.body: Black screens that appear on the client or loading screen are usually caused by a connection issue failing to load assets.  If this is the case for you, run through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to clear up any stability to reach us.  Let me know if you have any questions!
